UAChannelRegistrar Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAChannelRegistrar.h

Overview

The UAChannelRegistrar class is responsible for device registrations.

Tasks

  •   delegate property
  • – registerWithChannelID:channelLocation:withPayload:forcefully:
  • – cancelAllRequests

Properties

delegate

A UAChannelRegistrarDelegate delegate.

@property (nonatomic, weak) id<UAChannelRegistrarDelegate> delegate

Declared In

UAChannelRegistrar.h

Instance Methods

cancelAllRequests

Cancels all pending and current requests.

- (void)cancelAllRequests

Discussion

Note: This may or may not prevent the registration finished event and registration delegate calls.

Declared In

UAChannelRegistrar.h

registerWithChannelID:channelLocation:withPayload:forcefully:

Register the device with Urban Airship.

- (void)registerWithChannelID:(NSString *)channelID channelLocation:(NSString *)channelLocation withPayload:(UAChannelRegistrationPayload *)payload forcefully:(BOOL)forcefully

Parameters

channelID

The channel id to update. If nil is supplied, a channel will be created.

channelLocation

The channel location. If nil is supplied, a channel will be created.

payload

The payload for the registration.

forcefully

To force the registration, skipping duplicate request checks.

Declared In

UAChannelRegistrar.h
